Class JMEGeometryHelper

java.lang.Object
  ussr.physics.jme.JMEGeometryHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
PhysicsSimulationHelper
public class JMEGeometryHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements PhysicsSimulationHelper

Helper class used by various JME classes to perform geometry-related operations.

Author:
Modular Robots @ MMMI
